name: Chromen
description:
You have inherited your father shop. Can you maintain its acclaimed 100% accuracy rate through rough days and noisy clients?

This game was an entry for the Ludum Dare 47 Compo with the topic "stuck in a loop".

Source code at:  https://github.com/CaiClone/Chromen

## Controls:

  • Click/Z to select ingredients
  • R/C to use your loop powers

-----

This was my first game jam so there was quite a lot of trouble. Some of these troubles resulted in the final build having more than one bug. If you get stuck Pressing R or C might save you.

Hope that you enjoy your time playing Chromen!
